title: DDFP 495: Week 5 Red Challenge Flag picks & Who will win the NFC?
itunes:title: DDFP 495: Week 5 Red Challenge Flag picks & Who will win the NFC?
description:
Shek is joined by Handsome Hank and Matt "Money" Smith to discuss the controversy surrounding Odell Beckham Jr., how many games Tom Brady will win this year and who will end up winning the NFC. The guys also talk about what they're watching on TV this weekend, provide some new "Dad Jokes" and discuss what's going on with Jared Goff and the Rams. Then, the fellas make their selections and break down the biggest Week 5 games in this edition of Red Challenge Flag Picks.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
